hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: I'm a Full-stack developer with 5+ years of experience focused on web development. Visionary and creative problem solver. Autodidact who rapidly understands new concepts, ideas, technologies and methodologies.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I've been working as a web developer since 2019, with more than 5 years of university studies and projects as a self-taught developer. Currently, I focus on web technologies like React, Node, Express and MySQL.

contact.subtitle: Do you have a project in mind? I'd love to hear about it. I'm available for new opportunities and collaborations.

personalInfo.description: Full-stack developer with 3+ years of experience focused on web development. Visionary and creative problem solver. Autodidact who rapidly understands new concepts, ideas, technologies and methodologies.

freelance.title: Full Stack Developer
